sense.name: continue to exist; endure
sense.examples: The stories of alien abduction persist despite a decided lack of evidence. The smell persisted long after we had removed curtains. Violence persists in Gaza.

sense.name: continue doing something with no intention of stopping
sense.examples: She persisted to call me every night. He persists in promoting lies about immigrant leprosy cases. You must persist if you ever want to become a published writer!
